thread.title: Stunning Winners Of A Drone Photography Contest Selected From 27,000 Submissions
thread.title_full: Stunning Winners Of A Drone Photography Contest Selected From 27,000 Submissions

title: Stunning Winners Of A Drone Photography Contest Selected From 27,000 Submissions
text: Stunning Winners Of A Drone Photography Contest Selected From 27,000 Submissions By Izza Sofia , 23 Feb 2017 Brendon Dixon Drones have quickly gained popularity among the masses. They have been adopted by a growing number of photographers as a means of taking awesome aerial shots. Recently, there was a competition for best drone photography named SkyPixel Photo Contest, and it received 27,000 submissions. The competition had three categories—360, Beauty and Drones in Use—and were opened to both professional and amateur photographers. The submissions are incredible, featuring everyday that have been transformed into surreal imagery. Scroll down to view some of the beautiful photographs captured by drones—head over here for more.
